content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron-plate.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) used for smelting copper ore into copper-plate.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 10}, status NO_POWER, research set to automation, electrical_id updated to 24244.
- ElectricityGroup connecting small electric poles at positions (8.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5), and (9.5, 6.5) with voltage 0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Generator (steam engine) at position(-10.5, 18.5) used for producing electricity; warnings include "not connected to power network", "no input liquid", and "no fluid present in connections"; status NOT_CONNECTED; connection_points at positions (-10.5, 16.0) and (-10.5, 21.0).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) used for heating water; status NO_FUEL with warning "out of fuel"; connection_points at positions (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); linked to fluid_system 118403; steam_output_point at (-7.5, 24.5).
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) used for water intake; status WORKING; connection_point at (-9.5, 23.5); linked to fluid_system 118403.
- Wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5) serving as the manual fuel feeding system.
- Pipeline Network consisting of:
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 118403 at position(-5.5, 19.5) – status WORKING.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 118402 at position(-2.5, 19.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 118415 at position(5.5, 21.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 118414 at position(1.5, 23.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 118410 at position(-7.5, 25.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 118419 at position(0.5, 24.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 118418 at position(1.5, 25.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 118421 at position(1.5, 27.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 118422 at position(4.5, 27.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 118423 at position(-0.5, 28.5) – status EMPTY.
- ElectricityGroup with id 24244 connecting poles at positions (8.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5), and (9.5, 6.5).

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Pipe Group Connection Failures:
  - Both earlier and recent connection attempts using candidate pipe groups with fluid_system values [117075, 117159, 117241, 117325, 117407, 117491, 117573, 117657] and those from the new steps [117739, 117823, 117905, 117989, 118071, 118155, 118237, 118321] returned no candidates within a 15-unit radius of position (-5.5, 19.5).
  - Tip: Verify that the fluid_system identifier matches the active pipeline network—currently, fluid_system 118403 is in use—and adjust search parameters to encompass the actual candidate positions.
• Consistent Validation of Fluid System References:
  - Repeated failures indicate use of outdated fluid_system identifiers in API calls.
  - Tip: Confirm and update all fluid system references prior to connection attempts to ensure alignment with the current network configuration.
